comments.raw_text:
Happened while browsing profiles in LinkedIn Recruiter - the url wouldn't help you reproduce the experience, since it's specific to my account and session.  I browse LinkedIn profiles a lot, so it's weird.

1) created a new profile, started FFx with that profile, while leaving default profile session open: new profile session, everything worked fine
2) error console: no errors listed, just a bunch of warnings, and a single message (www.linkedin.com : server does not support RFC 5746, see CVE-2009-3555).
Have screen shots of the first two pages or console Warnings, if that would help.
3) a regular restart in my default profile cleared it up
